main.name: Grant Schowalter
main.description: I am passionate about engineering elegant solutions and building innovative projects. The real value in life comes from learning and I want to empower others to pursue their passions through my work.
main.bio: In 2021, I graduated from James Madison University with a BS in Computer Science. I currently work as a Technical Litigation Consultant for Elysium Digital LLC which is a susbisidairy of Aon. A typical day of work for my involves reading equal amounts code and legal documents as well as delivering expert consulting to my clients.
main.contactmessage: Please reach out to me through email. Make sure to tell me that you saw my website!

resume.skillmessage: I have a wide interest in technology and thus a wide array of experience. Always looking for a new challenge.

education.degree: Masters in Computer Science and Minor in Film Studies
education.description: Although never coding before I quickly fell in love with learning the problem solving, critical thinking, and elegant technique that the study of computer science offers.

work.title: Technical Litigation Consultant
work.description: I focus on providing source code review to a variety of my teams clients. I have reviewed a wide array of enterprise applications including microservice web apps, mobile apps, and Windows apps to name a few. I have also helped with containerizing, migrating, and developing internal code analysis tools mostly written in bash script and python.

work.title: Autonomous Vehicle Research Assistant
work.description: Implemented a voice detection system on an experimental autonomous vehicle intended for use on retirement home campuses. Worked on routing system using coordinate data and local Lidar positioning technology. Gained experience using machine learning algorithms and open source development.

work.title: Web Development Intern/Co-op
work.description: Participated in an agile team by developing code for a suite of commercial websites. Designed and implemented responsive web components and analytic tracking. Directly contributed to multiple business initiatives including a new business to business marketing site.

projects.title: Genworth Website Suite
projects.category: Web presence for Genworth Financial and their affiliates

projects.title: Autonomous Vehicle Research
projects.category: Helped to create an expiremental autonomous vehicle for use in retirement homes

projects.title: Wordle Bot
projects.category: Developed a simple wordle bot that out performs me most days

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.category: Implemented a personal website hosted using github pages. Recursion :p

Quotes.text: This wide world is all about you: you can fence yourself in, but you cannot forever fence it out
Every chess master was once a beginner.
